about_the_game:
Did you enjoy the music featured in Waifu Collector? Download it now and listen to it at any time!

This soundtrack features 23 tracks from the game, with primarily an electronic/chill sound.

Please note: all tracks are freely available from FreeMusicArchive. Buy this soundtrack only for convenience, or to support the developers of Waifu Collector!

legal_notice:
Waifu Collector is Copyright (c) 2020.

All music in this soundtrack and featured in the game is used under the Creative Commons Attribution License (CC BY 4.0).

A file containing license details and individual track attributions is included with the soundtrack.
name: Waifu Collector Official Soundtrack
